Scappaticci wore a blue fleece and green tracksuit bottoms as he entered his pleas to the charges. item.description:
Ex-IRA man quizzed over Donaldson killing dies after cancer fight  Independent.ie

Former IRA man Victor Notarantonio, who was questioned by gardaí about the murder of British agent Denis Donaldson, has died in his Belfast home. item.title: Columba McVeigh: fresh search for remains of IRA victim - The Guardian
item.description:
Columba McVeigh: fresh search for remains of IRA victim  The Guardian

Forensic archaeologists have launched a fresh attempt to find the remains of a Northern Ireland teenager who was abducted, murdered and secretly buried by the IRA in 1975. A team of contractors on Monday started combing an acre of Braggan bog, near Emyvale in County Monaghan, in the Republic of Ireland. The bog is believed to hold the body of Columba McVeigh, who was 19 when the IRA killed him on suspicion of working as an informer for the security forces at the height of the Troubles. item.description:
